DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effects of live sound-bed music on physiological and psychological parameters in staff of a hospital oncology ward.
DOC.brief_title: Short-term Effects of Sound-bed Music Therapy in Healthy Caregivers of a Hospital Oncology Ward (MTO_03)
DOC.criteria: signed informed consent of the participant affiliation to the staff of the hospital oncology ward insufficient knowledge of the German language alcohol, caffeine or nicotine less than 3 hours before the beginning
